title: Communi | Convert your crowd into customers.
content:
Welcome to the website (the Site) of Communi (Company, we, us, our). This Site is operated by Bakker Research International Limited (Hong Kong) and has been created to provide information about Communi and our online video education services and related services (together with the Site, the Services) to our Service visitors (you, your). This Privacy Policy sets forth Communi's policy with respect to information including personally identifiable data (Personal Data) and other information that is collected from visitors to the Site and Services.
Thank you for choosing to be part of our community at Communi. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy in compliance with international compliance law standards such as GDPR (Europe) and California Law (US). If you have any questions or concerns about our policy, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us at https://support.communi.com

When you visit the Communi website (the "Site") and use our services, you entrust us with your personal information. We are dedicated to protecting your privacy and take it very seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines our approach to privacy and provides clear information about what data we collect, how we use it, and the rights you have in relation to it. We encourage you to read it carefully, as it is crucial. If you disagree with any terms in this Privacy Policy, we ask that you discontinue your use of the Site and our services.

This privacy policy applies to all information collected through our websites (such as https://communi.com), our mobile applications, and any related services, sales, marketing, or events (we refer to them collectively in this privacy policy as the "Sites"). Please read this privacy policy carefully as it will help you make informed decisions about sharing your personal information with us.

excerpt:
Cancel your expensive subscriptions.
Communi is all you need to grow & monetize your brand.
